channel.title: Eat Sleep Pk //PI//login and pk// V1 //
channel.description:
[CENTER]this is one of my first projects DONT HATE [SIZE=5]Eat Sleep PkV1[/SIZE] i will host this soon.[/CENTER] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482677/screenshot.2.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482677/screenshot.2.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482681/screenshot.3.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482681/screenshot.3.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482684/screenshot.4.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482684/screenshot.4.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482686/screenshot.5.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482686/screenshot.5.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482688/screenshot.6.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482688/screenshot.6.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482689/screenshot.7.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482689/screenshot.7.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482691/screenshot.8.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482691/screenshot.8.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482692/screenshot.9.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482692/screenshot.9.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3482694/screenshot.10.jpg][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3482694/screenshot.10.jpg[/img][/url]
[SIZE=3]spots are needed on the dev team![/SIZE] owner - hex i will need a.. hoster, or someone who could provide money for funds (co-owner)(will receive 50% of donations until debt is paid for services //if services are given//) other 50% will go towards server funds i will also need a web and fourm developer and finally... there will probally be staff apps once server is online.
EDIT will also need a gfx artist, he will either have a option to be paid per gfx, or staff spot.[/SPOILER]
7/30/13 started project of a PI Source 7/30/13 removed all npc's spawns, and shops 7/30/13 redid all npc's spawns, and shops 7/30/13 fixed wildy death dupe 7/30/13 removed customs from game play until further notice (ewww customs) 7/31/13 began work on curses 7/31/13 began client work for 562 models 7/31/13 fixed claws timer 7/31/13 began work on adding torva and pernix 7/31/13 began work on adding new pkp system (tickets and artifacts) 7/31/13 added ::Cw clan wars multi
please leave back feedback, if you think sucks, tell me and ill see what i need to work on, and if you would like to help me out on the dev team, pm me and ill give you my skype

item.title: Eat Sleep Pk //PI//login and pk// V1 //
item.dc:creator: @Savy2007 Savy2007
item.description:
@Savy2007 wrote:

[CENTER]this is one of my first projects DONT HATE
[SIZE=5]Eat Sleep PkV1[/SIZE]
i will host this soon.[/CENTER]








[SIZE=3]spots are needed on the dev team![/SIZE]
owner - hex
i will need a…
hoster, or someone who could provide money for funds (co-owner)(will receive 50% of donations until debt is paid for services //if services are given//)
other 50% will go towards server funds
i will also need a web and fourm developer
and finally… there will probally be staff apps once server is online.

EDIT
will also need a gfx artist, he will either have a option to be paid per gfx, or staff spot.[/SPOILER]

7/30/13 started project of a PI Source
7/30/13 removed all npc’s spawns, and shops
7/30/13 redid all npc’s spawns, and shops
7/30/13 fixed wildy death dupe
7/30/13 removed customs from game play until further notice (ewww customs)
7/31/13 began work on curses
7/31/13 began client work for 562 models
7/31/13 fixed claws timer
7/31/13 began work on adding torva and pernix
7/31/13 began work on adding new pkp system (tickets and artifacts)
7/31/13 added ::Cw clan wars multi

please leave back feedback, if you think sucks, tell me and ill see what i need to work on,
and if you would like to help me out on the dev team, pm me and ill give you my skype
